cover.text: Convenient tools for the presentation of objects: create virtual tours with minimal time and resources

philosophy.label: Our philosophy
philosophy.description: We offer a unique widget for creating virtual tours that allow your clients to explore objects real estate in an interactive format.

widget.label: widget
descriptions: Our widget allows you to create an exciting and realistic view of the property
It helps your clients make informed decisions. We offer easy-to-use solutions that can be easily integrated into your business processes.
imageDescriptions: Full 360-degree building view with zoom capability for details
Accurate room layouts with finishing and furniture options
Unrestricted movement throughout the facility in any direction
Precise dimensions and proportions matching real-world specifications
Operates across all devices and platforms without limitations

clients.label: Cooperation
clients.description: Our clients are part of our team. You can always count on our support and expertise, because we strive to ensure that our partnership does not leave you indifferent

aboutUs.label: About us
aboutUs.description1: We understand that every company is unique, so we work closely with our customers to create customized solutions that meet their needs
aboutUs.description2: Our team not only develops technologies, but also provides support at every stage of cooperation
aboutUs.description3: With us you will receive not only a product, but also a partnership based on trust and mutual understanding.

how.description1: Our interactive solutions will help your clients choose real estate
how.description2: Create an unforgettable experience for your clients with our virtual tours
